Pre-Game Insights: England will be looking to get their combinations right as they prepare for the T20 World Cup 2024.
Pakistan will be trying different combinations and giving their players enough time to prepare for the showpiece event.
Both sides will be trying out different combinations in this series.
England have the edge in this series as the hosts and the defending T20 World Cup champions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Headingley offers a good amount of assistance to the pacers.
There is a high chance of rain predicted on Wednesday, with the temperature expected to be under 15 degrees Celsius.
Others: England vs Pakistan Head-to-Head: There have been 29 meetings between England and Pakistan in the shortest format. England have won 19 of those whereas Pakistan have won nine, with one ending in no-result.
